options.label: Background Video
options.help: Video format: mp4, YouTube, and Vimeo. Note: video background does not play on some mobile devices, background image will be used as fallback. Audio should be disabled to have auto play.

options.name: mute
options.help: Audio must be disabled in order to auto play in most browsers.

options.name: playonmobile
options.help: Video must be mp4 format (YouTube or Vimeo video is not supported).

options.label: zi
options.help: Module with greater stack order is always in front of an module with a lower stack order
